Author: DogTeeth_Val
Text: Disordered binge eating without a purge is classified as [binge eating disorder, or BED](https://www.bodywhys.ie/understanding-eating-disorders/binge-eating-disorder/).  The purging rounds it to bulimia. Now, not consistently using the same method of purging still counts as bulimia. Purging can be induced vomiting, fasting after meals, excessive exercise, laxative abuse, enemas, and more. Not every bulimic will purge every time.
